text: Serripes is a genus of molluscs in the family Cardiidae.Abbott, R.T. & Morris, P.A. A Field Guide to Shells: Atlantic and Gulf Coasts and the West Indies. New York: Houghton Mifflin, 1995. 60. ==Species== * Serripes groenlandicus (Mohr, 1786) -- Greenland cockle * Serripes laperousii (Deshayes, 1839) * Serripes notabilis (G. B. Sowerby III, 1915) ==References== Category:Cardiidae Category:Bivalve genera
title: Serripes
